mapper.insert: insert into ask_question (login_name, question, addition, tags, answers, approved, approved_by, approved_time, created_time) value(#{loginName}, #{question}, #{addition}, #{tags, typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.ask.repository.mybatis.TagListTypeHandler}, #{answers}, #{approved}, #{approvedBy}, #{approvedTime}, now())
mapper.update: update ask_question set login_name = #{loginName}, question = #{question}, addition = #{addition}, tags = #{tags, typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.ask.repository.mybatis.TagListTypeHandler}, answers = #{answers}, approved = #{approved}, approved_by = #{approvedBy}, approved_time = #{approvedTime} where id = #{id}
